name: VISIT_SET_DISCIPLINE
description: The VISIT_SET_DISCIPLINE table contains disciplines required to complete individual visits created from a visit set version.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the visit set record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_DISC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The disciplines of the providers required to perform visits defined by this version of the visit set

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_DISC_TYPE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_COUNT
columns.description: Number of providers of each discipline required to perform the visit defined by this version of the visit set
